headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: anchor_ids
parameters.description: A list of anchor IDs. Max size: 100. If anchor_ids is not passed, all anchors within the TTO Creator Marketplace account will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "anchors": [
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": "{{advertiser_preview_url}}",
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": "{{anchor_sub_title}}",
                "anchor_sub_type": "ENTERTAINMENT",
                "anchor_title": "{{anchor_title}}",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "TW",
                "coupon_link": null,
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "pixel_id": null,
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            },
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": "{{advertiser_preview_url}}",
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": "{{anchor_sub_title}}",
                "anchor_sub_type": "ECOMMERCE",
                "anchor_title": "{{anchor_title}}",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "US",
                "coupon_link": {
                    "coupon_code": "",
                    "coupon_url": "",
                    "discount": 5
                },
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            },
            {
                "advertiser_preview_url": null,
                "anchor_id": "{{anchor_id}}",
                "anchor_name": "{{anchor_name}}",
                "anchor_sub_title": null,
                "anchor_sub_type": "DESTINATION",
                "anchor_title": "Watch Now",
                "anchor_type": "WEB_ANCHOR",
                "call_to_action": {
                    "android_deep_link": null,
                    "android_download_link": null,
                    "ios_deep_link": null,
                    "ios_download_link": null,
                    "landing_page_url": "{{landing_page_url}}"
                },
                "country_code": "CA",
                "coupon_link": null,
                "creator_preview_url": "{{creator_preview_url}}",
                "pixel_id": "7258197703320944642",
                "status": "IN_REVIEW",
                "thumbnail_url": "{{thumbnail_url}}"
            }
        ],
        "page_info": {
            "page": 1,
            "page_size": 50,
            "total_number": 3,
            "total_page": 1
        }
    }
}
